content: this pattern can easily be modified to make it larger or smaller as well as changing the border the coin stitch pattern is a multiple of 4 stitches plus 1 the finished size is 40 x 45 after washing and being loved for one year important note in order for the coin stitch to pop you need to knit tighter than normal if you re having trouble try using a smaller needle size also block gently to avoid flattening the bubbles please post pictures of your finished creations i would love to see them russian translation graciously provided by katharina sokiran italian translation isn t very good but perhaps some may find it useful google translate is not the best
